review:
想都没想买了俩监测站礼包，一个国服，一个外服，好好好，我是守望新英雄joker。以前打守望的朋友都不玩了“不会还有人在玩守望先锋吧”，没办法第一次16年初中毕业，补习偷偷和同学溜出去，当时他们去手机店拿着现金叫老板帮忙买个啥游戏，后来偷偷去黑网吧蹭着玩了会狂鼠，后来对这款游戏就一直念念不忘，高考结束在最后班主任总结的时候就原价买了豪华版，晚上直接去网吧，结果未满18不能开机子，就只能蹭蹭好基友的电脑，高中毕业以前家里不准玩游戏，没打过fps，菜的天天被队友喷，后来就一直死神狂鼠，直到被钻石好基友半藏特训一晚上。。。大一大学不准打游戏，偷偷玩守望，天天被导员骂，疫情在家在守望认识了很多人，摆烂不更新也一直在玩，虽然直到现在也不过是个臭白金，但是自己的高中大学生活一直都有守望的回忆，感谢姐夫和最初的守望先锋制作组，你们是真正的守望先锋。

最后要问候烤迪克的不存在的亲妈，祝她在下面过的幸福&烤烤考迪克的迪克，rnm退钱！！！！！

Blizzard simplesmente pegou o Overwatch, tirou alguns mapas, alterou o horario de outros, adicionou PayWall para novos heróis (que são de longe os mais fortes), colocou uma monetização absurda em cima dos cosméticos e além de não consertarem vários dos problemas do jogo original eles ainda conseguiram piorar o matchmaking fazendo ser 8/80 - partidas extremamente faceis ou extremamente dificeis, e sistema de ranking horrivel (você precisa vencer 7 partidas para receber o novo ranking e não importa o desempenho na partida - venceu sobe de elo, perdeu desce de elo) e isso junto do matchmaking pessimo e uma das comunidades mais tóxicas dos jogos deixa a experiencia horrivel. 
Sendo bem sincero: é melhor jogar LOL.
monke
Buff Roadhog.

Why are we still here? Just to suffer? Every night, I can feel my leg… and my arm… even my fingers. The body I’ve lost… the comrades I’ve lost… won’t stop hurting… It’s like they’re all still there. You feel it, too, don’t you?

Overwatch is like a dream.
A dream you keep close to your heart, chasing it, only to never reach it, losing every bit of your soul along the way. You stick to it for years, hang onto it, only to continuously be disillusioned and disappointed. It breaks you, it ruins you.

Overwatch is a promise.
A promise that will not be kept, one that will never get fulfilled. So many sweet and big words uttered meaninglessly, because none of it will come true.

Overwatch is the truth.
A villainous truth. It bears the face of reality. The mirror of the human soul, revealing how vain we are. The true reflection of the depths of human greed.

Parto con la premessa che al rilancio del gioco ovvero nel 4 ottobre 2022 il gioco era godibile questo per quasi 3 season, poi verso al fine della terza inizio della quarta è andato tutto a puttane, matchmaking orrido, prima il problema lo si trovava solo nelle competitive (ranked) mentre nel resto era sopportabile, Non solo ammettono del problema ma dicono (su twitter) che risolveranno il tutto con le prossime patch..., morale della storia per quanto riguarda il matchmaking da partite pubbliche per chillare si sono trasformate in una tortura (squadre troppo sbilanciate) ranked rimaste con lo stesso problema dal lancio..., la modalità storia (per cui io come molti eravamo disposti anche a pagarla 40/60 euro) viene cancellata ed il tutto condito con un "ci saranno delle missioni pve!!!" quando ci era stata promessa una campagna, cosa per cui tra l'altro è stato giustificato il rilancio del gioco stesso..., azienda poco seria non merita un centesimo (riprovato in data 10/08/2023 per constatare che non è cambiato un emerito cazzo).

[b]This Game was once a full price AAA title with casino loot box systems. But in my unpopular opinion, it was fine back then. Overwatch lootbox system was clearly one of the better ones out there, because it wasn't really worth using it and didn't used fomo very hard. But let me explain:

Yes, there were Events with time limited stuff and lootboxes, but none of the stuff was actually a "real" fomo, because if you missed anything, you could just wait until the event returns. That was fine and in my opinion one of the best systems I had in those types of games (even if you need to pay it) and better than any free to play game I played (or pay to play game).

________________________________________________________________

But then, Overwatch 2 was announced, for the WHOLE REASON because it should get PVE Content. And they said they would make it free to play and stop the lootbox system. Everybody back then was like super hyped, but I was already kinda sceptical. Because yes they had lootboxes and sh*t. But if you think it from a "fomo perspective", that lootbox system was way more relaxing than battle passes that you (if you want to collect everything) HAVE TO grind out and never “forced you” to play the game in that regard. 

________________________________________________________________


Then they released a "Pre-Order Package" for Overwatch 2. That included some skins and the PVE Mode was advertised in it too (Which they said it will come later to the game). At that time, we already saw the Ingame shop and the battlepass system. Not only does the game have a super slow battle pass to grind out (and all the fomo stuff I'm usually criticizing in my negative reviews).

No. It also contained a shop with 20€ (!) expensive skins for single heroes... And they changed the whole game system from 2 Tanks to 1 Tank, which they got also criticized for. They actually DELETED your bought copy of Overwatch 1 and replaced it with a "OVerWaTCh 2", copy with less content and game experience and cancelled stuff. Hell, they even needed to temporary delete heroes (which you probably also spend money for skins for) for like 2 weeks because they couldn’t nerf them.

If you bought Overwatch 1 back in the days (which was only like 6-7 years ago I think), you will NEVER be able to play it again! Because it got replaced with a sh*ttier free to play copy of the game with a horrible system of microtransactions, fomo and battle passes.

________________________________________________________________

And then afterwards in May 2023, we know how it went:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CL-dGiiqUVw

They cancelled the PVE Mode. The WHOLE reason they justified the game in the first place. (Remember people already bought pre-order packages for it). In the same Dev Stream they also said, Overwatch 2 will contain some PVE Missions, which you might also need to pay for in the future :) I don’t even care about the gameplay and other stuff in this review. Of course the art is amazing and gameplay feels good (except the usual nerf stuff), because it’s a Blizzard game and they always deliver; and their art teams do great work in every one of their games<3 There were great guys that had a vision for the game, but Bobby and co. just saw it as a Cash cow that wants to get milked harder than a female Tauren in Stormwind. There was a reason Jeff Kaplan and nearly everybody of his team left.

______________________________________________________________


You can’t call Overwatch 2 a “new game”, not even call if a “Prequel”. You can’t even call it an “Update”. I would call it a “Downgrade” from Overwatch 1 with much more scam and microtransactions included. I think that sums up the game pretty well.
______________________________________________________________

This company and Bobby should go to hell. I hope Lillith, The Lichking, the old gods and Sargeras have a special place for them there.

But let me conclude with this video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MzKlmNLTkXM

Can't wait to write my reviews for Hearthstone, World of Wracraft, Diablo and Starcraft <3[/b]

The many failures of Overwatch 2:
The removal of systems that just didn't have to be taken out
The removal of the on fire system
The removal of account levels
The removal of SR
The removal of the post game card system
The state of matchmaking at least in seasons 1, 2, and 3
The fact is that to get short queues you need to sacrifice matchmaking accuracy, so the thought is there but its really not all that fun to get you ass eaten by a fucking global elite gamer.
There also is the problem of 5 wins, derank, thanks for your playtime, go fuck yourself.
The disastrous queue time issues on launch
Constant bugs with the new engine that was made in order to facilitate the PvE content that has now been cut.
Blizzard polish by the way.
Overly Aggressive Monetization
Battle passes that cost too much, give too little, and have the potential to be seen as pay to win with the inclusion of just buying the new Heros
Skins that we would have gotten for free using the old monetization system but now cost from 5 to 21 real life dollars. It really just seems like the Overwatch team is just an art team that shits out overpriced skins.
Every new map existed in 2019
Upon review of the Overwatch 2 launch trailer from 2019 every new map we have gotten was actually already made, Brazil, Circuit Royal, Toronto,  and I assure you we will be getting Gothenburg and India as new content even though they have existed for longer than Overwatch 2 itself.
A horrific amount of character balance issues
The Sombra rework (another one coming in 4 months by the way)
Season 1 Sojourn, Season 2 Sojourn Mercy combo
Genji nerfs during the terror of Sojourn.
Roadhog just being Roadhog.
Tankfist being a limp dick pussy unless you are gods gift upon this green earth.
A breakdown in worldbuilding
The original roster of Overwatch characters and every character until Kiriko had a background and lore based in some form of high science, bar Hanzo and Genji but they are cyber ninjas.
It really does feel like the new characters storytelling has fallen off the edge of the world
Sojourn: already in the lore
Junker Queen: already in the lore
Kiriko: Bland at best irritating at worst
Lifeweaver: Fucking saltine cracker, blander than water.
And now the holy grail, Cutting the PvE content
I am honestly convinced that the Talent Tree UI and Level Progression UIs were all made in Photoshop or after effects at this point. 
WHERE DID IT GO?! We waited 3 years… FOR PUSH AND 5v5 THAT'S IT
Just because I play your game doesn't mean I enjoy it

Не стоило Близзард переводить эту ламповую игру на f2p, было бы лучше, если б я купил один раз игру раз и уж пусть контент поступал бы бесплатно по мере выхода, но никак не как сейчас, с ежемесячной подпиской на баттл-пасс... Боже.
 Столько людей ждало, мы думали о ИГРЕ о КАЧЕСТВЕ, все катсцены сейчас можно глянуть на ют и они идут 20 мин.
Какой же смех видеть на твиче восхищающихся америкосов, проплаченных и орущих, мол как же важно купить мне это ПВЕ
Ребят, что происходит с игрой, чьи старые синиматики я уже как традиция, пересматриваю раз в год зимой перед НГ. 
Что происходит с поддержкой.. Делали скины по пол года-год? Серьёзно? А эти несчастные три миссии за ПОЛТОРЫ ТЫСЯЧИ рублей, первая кстати полностью готова была еще в 2019.
Мне приятно, что на игру не забили до конца, но верить этим типам, что после Такой обновы (по сравнению с прошлыми сезонами и упаси всех от воспоминания о унылейшем 5 сезоне) что-то годное будет или будет на том же уровне уже не приходится.. Онлайн вырос, а будет ли контент для каждого? Что за муссор в баттлпассе? 4-5 скинов за либо рубли либо 3 сезона еженедельных выполнений заданий на золотые монетки... Это работа, а не развлечение.
Пока что, на этом сезоне (6-м) Рекомендую попробовать, атмосфера ранее сделанных в 2016г карт завлечет, а новые... Просто надеюсь что эта игра - Феникс, и восстанет она из собственного пепла.
PS: Меч-пушка-лазер-хилка у нового перса кринж eбаный ИМХО

I was brimming with excitement when I learned that the characters I had encountered in specific videos were ready to take a central place on the Steam platform with their own game. My anticipation soared, and I eagerly looked forward to plunging into a realm that, until then, had only existed within my nights of curiosity.

However, disappointment set in as I realized that the magic I had envisioned was notably gone. Watching the characters in-game felt like a lackluster experience; their interactions failed to capture the same level of engagement that had once drawn me in. It was disheartening to witness these beloved characters deviate from their true essences.

Yet, despite the letdown, there was a redeeming glint of something worthwhile. The voices that accompanied the characters were well-executed, conveying their unique traits with accuracy. Nevertheless, even with this accomplishment, I couldn't shake the feeling that something was amiss. The delight I had grown accustomed seemed strangely absent, as the events I had hoped to witness unfold never quite materialized, particularly in the story mode.

Nonetheless, even this redeeming quality couldn't overshadow the overall disconnection I felt. The mismatch between my expectations and the game's reality was undeniable, and it left me disenchanted.

In the end, the allure I had hoped for didn't materialize, leaving me with a sense of detachment and disillusionment. The stark reminder that not all journeys lead to the desired destination was a testament to the dissonance between my initial excitement and the eventual experience.

To co blizzard zrobił z tą grą to jest wielkie X kurwa D. Zabili jedynkę chęcią zrobienia PvE, którego i tak nie dostaliśmy, więc ta dwójka w tytule straciła cały swój sens. Monetyzacja dalej jest jaka jest, zmiana tekstury do jednego ludzika, której i tak nie widać 90% gry kosztuje 20$, dalej grinduje się te tokeny do usranej śmierci, postacie dalej są zablokowane za battle passem, więc sry ale jak nie masz jakiejś postaci i przez to nie możesz w trakcie meczu czegoś skontrować no to "xd". Gra dalej jest niezbalansowana i nieprzystosowana do tego 5v5 + fakt, że nie wszyscy mogą mieć wszystkie postacie pogłębia ten problem (imagine nie mieć dostępnych wszystkich postaci w grze opartej na dopasowaniu się do sytuacji i kontrowaniu przeciwnika, jak w pierwszej części)

Generalnie mówiąc to nic się nie zmieniło przez ten rok od premiery Ov2, gra dalej jest chujowa jak nie jeszcze gorsza, ale hej, możemy kupić misje za 60 ziko, które dadzą nam masę zabawy :D

Играю с 17 года, даже не заходите, цифра 2 всё испортила. ПВЕ это полная хрень за 15 баксов, проходняк за полтора часа. А ведь раньше мы получали это всё бесплатно. Близы хотели отзывы. Получайте отзывы

i have over 500 hours on overwatch and overwatch 2 combined, spanning from xbox and battle.net. while i would've considered it one of my favourite multiplayer games of all time back then, it has significantly fallen from grace. in my personal opinion, they are ONLY putting this on steam to try and milk steam players of more money, considering the fact the game hasn't been doing as well as they would've hoped for. ubisoft is known for doing this as well.

all i can say is GET OUT WHILE YOU CAN. please do not support this game and activision blizzard for constantly lying to the community and turning overwatch 2 into what is essentially a free to play patch for overwatch 1. almost EVERYTHING that had been promised in overwatch 2 (aka the whole reason to justify a new game) has either been indefinitely delayed or completely cancelled. supporting this company with your money means you are supporting activision blizzards immoral and extremely anti-consumer practices.

if you're interested in just the gameplay, then by all means go ahead and try it out. in my opinion the game is still rather fun, especially with friends. just PLEASE do not give this game any of your money.

promising an entire fully fleshed out pve mode with skill trees and replayable missions and then outright cancelling it and then selling 3 small pve missions with next to no replayability for $15 each is the biggest middle finger you can give to your community. i am still shocked how quickly activision blizzard managed to lose all the trust they had spent YEARS building up in their entire playerbase.

overwatch 2 is the perfect example of when greed rears its ugly head and takes over all thinking. all they care about is your money.
i miss lootboxes
Went from game of the year winner of 2016 to this, what a fall from grace
I have played this game since 2016. How the mighty have fallen
Overwatch war zum ende hin schon echt trash, aber Overwatch 2 hat den ersten "Teil" nochmal unterboten, holy ♥♥♥♥ ist das game schlecht

[h1]爹味的策划 狗屎的客服[/h1]
我与OW国际服打交道已经接近七八年了。

1.我已经在明确没有开挂影响他人的情况下被封停了两个账户，非常巧合的是在我充值了约1000人民币之后第二天就被封停。且客服态度极其傲慢，大多是机器回答。这种情况不是个例，我的朋友只打快速娱乐6年的老号也仅因“违反游戏规则”被封禁。望各位想充钱的三思。

2.这个游戏他所谓的游戏平衡倒不如说是一种教你怎么玩，你必须遵守他们的想法与规矩，而不是玩家为导向的。譬如技能的效果 CD 持续时间可能一个赛季就是一变，导致玩家措手不及。例如路霸从极度强势到现在基本没法用，希格玛无法秒人，天使的极度增强到连着削弱，安娜瓶子三个赛季三个效果时间，两个初始治疗量等等。

3.每个版本都有所谓强势组合，试问他们所谓的平衡平衡了个几把？你想赢就得按照这么玩，一个游戏变成一个套路，一种模式，非常无趣。

4.完全不顾及用户感受，我打个比方，游戏内语音掉麦问题，已经持续多少年了？用战网客户端的时候，更新卡初始化，卡1kb的速度，多少年了？这些问题我查阅了相关论坛，存在着大量中外文反馈，没有任何修复的动作。

5.糟糕的平衡制度，当你一路顺利的游戏，就会开始给你排奇葩队友。于是乎玩这个游戏就好像是一种修行，一种受虐。问题不在于你，但你赢不了，你表现的再好也只能是输，于是越来越多的人索性划水，最终退游。

我现在还玩这个游戏的原因很简单，这里面有我的青春。我最近又联络上16年OW亚服认识的朋友，与其说是游戏，倒不如说现在更像是聊天了。
The only good thing about this piece of shit game is the porn. Don't bother playing this trash.
im only here for ramattra
